Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to requirements for certain contracts for attachments to utility poles and the use of utility ducts, trenches and conduits
Summary: Requires contracts for cable television and broadband internet attachments to utility poles and the use of utility ducts, trenches and conduits to include all such poles, ducts, trenches and conduits located within a given census tract.
LawCode: Amd ยง119-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requirements for certain contracts for attachments to utility poles and the use of utility ducts, trenches and conduits
